blogPosts.title: 5 Principles of Equity-Centered Design
blogPosts.excerpt: Discover the fundamental principles that guide our approach to creating inclusive, accessible, and impactful design solutions for social good.
blogPosts.content: Blog post content would be in Portable Text format here...

seo.metaTitle: 5 Principles of Equity-Centered Design | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: Learn the 5 core principles that drive equity-centered design: inclusivity, accessibility, community voice, cultural competency, and measurable impact.

blogPosts.title: How Accessible Design Drives Better Outcomes for Everyone
blogPosts.excerpt: Accessibility isn't just about compliance—it's about creating experiences that work better for all users. Here's how accessible design benefits everyone.

seo.metaTitle: How Accessible Design Benefits All Users | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: Discover how designing for accessibility creates better user experiences for everyone, not just people with disabilities. Real examples and impact metrics.

blogPosts.title: Redesigning the Nonprofit Experience: A Case for User-Centered Design
blogPosts.excerpt: Nonprofits face unique challenges in digital design. Learn how user-centered design principles can help organizations amplify their impact.

seo.metaTitle: User-Centered Design for Nonprofits | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: How nonprofits can use user-centered design to better serve their communities, engage donors, and amplify their mission. Practical strategies and examples.

blogPosts.title: The ROI of Equity: Why Inclusive Design Is Good for Business
blogPosts.excerpt: Inclusive design isn't just the right thing to do—it's smart business. Explore the data behind why equity-centered design drives better outcomes and ROI.

seo.metaTitle: The Business ROI of Inclusive Design | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: Data-driven analysis of how inclusive design improves user engagement, expands market reach, and drives measurable business outcomes.

blogPosts.title: From Wireframes to Impact: Our Design Process Explained
blogPosts.excerpt: Ever wondered what goes into creating a website that drives real social impact? We break down our design process from discovery to launch.

seo.metaTitle: Our Design Process: From Wireframes to Impact | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: A transparent look at our 6-phase design process for creating impactful, user-centered digital experiences for nonprofits and social enterprises.

blogPosts.title: Community-Centered Design: Listening Before Creating
blogPosts.excerpt: The best design solutions come from deep listening. Learn how we partner with communities to co-create solutions that truly meet their needs.

seo.metaTitle: Community-Centered Design Methodology | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: How we use participatory design methods to create solutions with communities, not for them. Real examples and best practices.

blogPosts.title: Data Visualization for Social Good: Making Complex Data Accessible
blogPosts.excerpt: Data tells powerful stories—when it's presented accessibly. Explore how thoughtful data visualization can drive understanding and action.

seo.metaTitle: Accessible Data Visualization for Social Impact | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: Best practices for creating data visualizations that are both compelling and accessible. Make your data drive action.

blogPosts.title: Color, Contrast, and Culture: Designing for Global Audiences
blogPosts.excerpt: Color choices carry cultural meaning and accessibility implications. Learn how to create color palettes that work across cultures and abilities.

seo.metaTitle: Culturally Sensitive & Accessible Color Design | Equity by Design
seo.metaDescription: How to choose colors that meet WCAG accessibility standards while respecting cultural contexts and creating emotional impact.
